about_the_game:
Step into the shoes of a conductor and take charge of a train where every journey is a new adventure. Manage tickets, serve passengers, and keep the locomotive on time as through diverse landscapes and unexpected challenges.

As a conductor, you're responsible for the entire train, from first class to second class, and beyond. Whether it's stowing luggage, checking tickets, or attending to passengers in the bar and onboard restaurant, your tasks are varied and never boring. You can move freely through the train, interact with passengers, and inspect their tickets. Different routes and changing backgrounds ensure that no two journeys are the same

Passengers have different needs: while first-class travelers expect premium service, all passengers want to arrive on time. It’s your job to ensure the train reaches its destination punctually—sometimes by speeding up and sometimes by slowing down on uneven tracks.







[PLEASE NOTE:]
"The Conductor" is still in the prototype phase, with many features under development. Look forward to regular updates in the coming months and years that will continuously expand and improve the game.
